scarabeus.ordersAreSavedToHistoryForLoggedinUsers: Orders are saved to history only for logged in users.
scarabeus.thisIsNotRealOrder: This is not a real order.
scarabeus.enterYourEmailAndIContactYou: Enter your email and I will contact you. The price is also different for each piece so we'll talk about this later.
scarabeus.wePickExquisiteSpecimensArticle: We pick exquisite specimens with attention to detail to accommodate the expectations of the most meticulous collectors.
scarabeus.twoSheetsOfUvBlockingGlassesArticle: Two sheets of UV blocking glass imbedded in high grade red beech or oak hardwood, creating an exclusive frame, a beautiful yet minimalist centrepiece of any home.
scarabeus.typicalOrUnusualArtical: Typical or unusual, we can cater to whatever you're after. If you have any question or request a custom item, do not hesitate to contact us at
